short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make challenging crosswords more fun! Reveals some letters in NYT puzzles to help you get unstuck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New York Times crosswords ever get more frustrating than fun? This extension offers the perfect middle ground between getting completely stuck and using full hints.

How it works:
1. Select one or more letters. For instance, 'A' and 'B'.
2. Hit submit. The extension will automatically reveal all tiles that are either 'A' or 'B.' Think Wheel of Fortune.

Use this right when you start a puzzle or when you get stuck!

Warning: When submit is hit, the extension will enable autocheck and end streaks!
